Class SimpleHolder<K>

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.SimpleHolder<K>
Type Parameters:
K - the type of the value being held
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<K>
@Holder public class SimpleHolder<K> extends Object implements Supplier<K>
A simple generic holder class that encapsulates a value of type K.

This class is useful as a mutable reference wrapper, for example:

  • Passing a value into lambdas or callbacks where reassignment is needed.
  • Adjusting a stored value atomically using a function.
  • Temporarily holding objects that may be cleared and reset later.

    • adjust

      public void adjust(Function<K,K> adjustment)
      Adjusts the current value by applying the given function.

      This method is synchronized to ensure that the adjustment is applied atomically in multi-threaded environments.

      Parameters:
      adjustment - a function that takes the current value and returns the adjusted value
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the adjustment function is null

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the holder by setting its value to null.
